winter 2024: In the winter of 2024, French women in their early 20s are expected to follow some cool fashion trends. Oversized outerwear, like long loose coats and puffer jackets, will be super popular because they're stylish and keep you warm. Tweet jackets and plaid patterns are making a comeback too. Giving off a classic yet chic vibe. Monochrome looks where you dress in one color like black, gray, or beige, will be trendy as well. Chunky boots with thick soles are a must-have for winter. They're both fashionable and practical. French chic style remains strong, with simple black and white outfits, trench coats, and knit sweaters.
